001package com.randomnoun.common.jessop;
002
003/* (c) 2016 randomnoun. All Rights Reserved. This work is licensed under a
004 * BSD Simplified License. ( http://www.randomnoun.com/bsd-simplified.html ) 
005 */
006
007import java.util.Properties;
008
009import javax.script.Compilable;
010import javax.script.CompiledScript;
011import javax.script.ScriptEngineManager;
012import javax.script.ScriptEngine;
013import javax.script.ScriptException;
014
015import org.apache.log4j.Logger;
016import org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator;
017
018import junit.framework.TestCase;
019
020/** This unit test checks whether suppressEol declarations work as expected
021 * 
022 * @author knoxg
023 */
024public class SuppressEolTest extends TestCase {
025
026        Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(SuppressEolTest.class);
027        
028        public void setUp() {
029                String logFormatPrefix = "[SuppressEolTest] ";
030                Properties lp = new Properties();
031                lp.put("log4j.rootCategory", "INFO, CONSOLE");
032                lp.put("log4j.appender.CONSOLE", "org.apache.log4j.ConsoleAppender");
033                lp.put("log4j.appender.CONSOLE.layout", "org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout");
034                lp.put("log4j.appender.CONSOLE.layout.ConversionPattern", logFormatPrefix + "%d{ABSOLUTE} %-5p %c - %m%n");
035                lp.put("log4j.logger.org.springframework", "INFO"); // since Spring is a bit too verbose for my liking at DEBUG level
036                PropertyConfigurator.configure(lp);
037
038        }
039        
040        public final static String JAVASCRIPT_COUNTING_SCRIPT = 
041          "<%@ jessop language=\"javascript\" suppressEol=\"true\"%>\n" + // was engine=\"rhino\", but we may want nashorn 
042          "just some text\n" +
043          "<% for (var i=1; i<10; i++) { %>\n" +
044          "<%= i %>\n" +
045          "<% } %>";
046
047        public final static String LUA_COUNTING_SCRIPT = 
048          "<%@ jessop language=\"lua\" engine=\"luaj\" suppressEol=\"true\"%>\n" +
049          "just some text\n" +
050          "<% for i=1,10 do %>\n" +
051          "<%= i %>\n" +
052          "<% end %>";
053
054        public final static String PYTHON_COUNTING_SCRIPT_1 = 
055          "<%@ jessop language=\"python2\" engine=\"jython\" suppressEol=\"true\"%>\n" +  // might add languageVersion later (jython is python2.7)
056          "just some text\n" +
057          "<%\n" +
058          "for i in range(1, 10):\n"+
059          "%>\n" +
060          "<%= i %>\n" +
061          "<%\n" +
062          "pass;\n" +  // end of block
063          "%>\n" +
064          "not in loop\n";
065        
066
067        public final static String PYTHON_COUNTING_SCRIPT_2 = 
068          "<%@ jessop language=\"python2\" engine=\"jython\" suppressEol=\"true\"%>\n" +  // might add languageVersion later (jython is python2.7)
069          "just some text\n" +
070          "<% for i in range(1, 10): %>\n" +
071          "<%= i %>\n";
072
073        public final static String JAVA_COUNTING_SCRIPT = 
074          "<%@ jessop language=\"java\" engine=\"beanshell\" suppressEol=\"true\"%>\n" +
075          "just some text\n" + 
076          "<% for (int i=1; i<10; i++) { %>\n" +
077          "<%= i %>\n" +
078          "<% } %>";
079        
080        public final static String LISP_COUNTING_SCRIPT = 
081          "<%@ jessop language=\"lisp\" engine=\"ABCL\" suppressEol=\"true\"%>\n" +
082          "just some text\n" + 
083          "<% (loop for a from 1 to 10 do %>\n" + // inclusive
084          "<%= a %>\n" +
085          "<% ) %>";
086
087        private String getSource(ScriptEngine engine, String jessopSource) throws ScriptException {
088                Compilable compilable = (Compilable) engine;
089                JessopCompiledScript compiledScript = (JessopCompiledScript) compilable.compile(jessopSource);
090                return compiledScript.getSource();
091        }
092        
093        public void testJessop1() throws ScriptException {
094                ScriptEngine engine = new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
095                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
096                logger.info("Start eval");
097                engine.eval(JAVASCRIPT_COUNTING_SCRIPT);
098                logger.info("End eval");
099        }
100        
101        public void testJessopCompile() throws ScriptException {
102                Compilable engine = (Compilable) new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
103                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
104                
105                CompiledScript script = engine.compile(JAVASCRIPT_COUNTING_SCRIPT);
106                
107                JessopCompiledScript jessopScript = (JessopCompiledScript) script;
108                logger.info("Start source");
109                logger.info(jessopScript.getSource());
110                logger.info("End source");
111                
112        }
113
114        public void testJessopLua() throws ScriptException {
115                ScriptEngine engine = new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
116                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
117                logger.info("lua source: " + ((JessopCompiledScript) (((Compilable) engine).compile(LUA_COUNTING_SCRIPT))).getSource());
118                
119                logger.info("Start eval");
120                engine.eval(LUA_COUNTING_SCRIPT);
121                logger.info("End eval");
122        }
123
124        public void testJessopPython1() throws ScriptException {
125                // -Dpython.console.encoding=UTF-8
126                // see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/30443537/how-do-i-fix-unsupportedcharsetexception-in-eclipse-kepler-luna-with-jython-pyde
127                System.setProperty("python.console.encoding", "UTF-8");
128                
129                // can either specify the language here (e.g. jessop-rhino), or just 'jessop' to get language from the script itself
130                ScriptEngine engine = new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
131                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
132                logger.info("python source: " + getSource(engine, PYTHON_COUNTING_SCRIPT_1));
133                
134                logger.info("Start eval");
135                engine.eval(PYTHON_COUNTING_SCRIPT_1);
136                logger.info("End eval");
137        }
138
139        public void testJessopPython2() throws ScriptException {
140                // -Dpython.console.encoding=UTF-8
141                // see http://stackoverflow.com/questions/30443537/how-do-i-fix-unsupportedcharsetexception-in-eclipse-kepler-luna-with-jython-pyde
142                System.setProperty("python.console.encoding", "UTF-8");
143                ScriptEngine engine = new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
144                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
145                logger.info("python source: " + getSource(engine, PYTHON_COUNTING_SCRIPT_2));
146                
147                logger.info("Start eval");
148                engine.eval(PYTHON_COUNTING_SCRIPT_2);
149                logger.info("End eval");
150        }
151        
152        public void testJessopBeanshell() throws ScriptException {
153                ScriptEngine engine = new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
154                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
155                System.out.println("java source: " + getSource(engine, JAVA_COUNTING_SCRIPT));
156                
157                logger.info("Start eval");
158                engine.eval(JAVA_COUNTING_SCRIPT);
159                logger.info("End eval");
160        }
161
162        public void testJessopLisp() throws ScriptException {
163                ScriptEngine engine = new ScriptEngineManager().getEngineByName("jessop");
164                if (engine==null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Missing engine 'jessop'"); }
165                System.out.println("lisp source: " + getSource(engine, LISP_COUNTING_SCRIPT));
166                
167                logger.info("Start eval");
168                engine.eval(LISP_COUNTING_SCRIPT);
169                logger.info("End eval");
170        }
171
172        
173}
